name: WP Chatbull
author: G-axon

sections.description:
Now chat with your website visitors with WP ChatBull. This is a perfect fit for Small Business for both who sell products and services. It hosts data & files completely on your own server. No need to connect with any third party or pay subscriptions. Install WP ChatBull today to find your potential customers and improve your conversion rate.

You can upgrade to ChatBull Pro to have Desktop (for both Widnows & Mac) and Android apps for operators.

Free Version Features

  • No Subscriptions
  • Host everything (database & files) on your own server. All data you have is completely yours.
  • Unlimited simultaneous live chats
  • Unlimited departments
  • Easy to use admin and visitor interface
  • Brand it like yours. We do not put Powered By anywhere on the visitor chatbox
  • Customize the colors as per your need
  • Visitors can give feedback to the operators
  • You can enable or disable the chatbox anytime
  • You can turn the status online/offline and it will show accordingly to the visitors
  • Intelligence of showing LIVE to visitors if any operator is online
  • If offline then visitors can leave offline messages.
  • Browser notifications in Google Chrome for operators
  • Sound notification for both visitor and operator panel
  • Operator can see the page link visitor is on
  • Can customize labels & texts to convey the message as you like
  • Analytic dashboard to show useful information like visitor count, locations, most visited pages etc.

and many more is there.

Pro Version Additional Features

  • All free version features
  • Pay one time only no subscription
  • Supports multiple domains
  • Can change theme for visitor chatbox
  • Can bypass the pre-chat input form for visitors
  • Can set time to pop out the visitor chatbox automatically
  • Operator can forward chat to other operators
  • Canned Responses for operators and admin
  • Emoji support
  • Code very well reviewed by Envato
  • Desktop app for both Windows & Mac OS
  • Can use our android app from Google Play Store

Use this link to purchase ChatBull Pro

Coming Soon Features

  • iOS App
  • Multilingual Support
sections.installation:
1. Copy the ‘wp-chatbull’ folder into your plugins folder.
  2. Activate the plugin via the ‘Plugins‘ admin page.
sections.changelog:
1.1

22June.2019. Updated plugin according WordPress version.

1.0

1.July.2017. Initial Release.
